ch0135_00_kagetsu/0101_0701_01_10:
Yo, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I was waitin’
for you.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0101_0701_02_10:
You’re looking sharp today! Get out there and
have the most excellent battles!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0601_0701_01_10:
You know how here on Pasio, there’s all kinds of
people gathered in one place?
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0601_0701_02_10:
Every once in a while, I’ll run into someone with a
really rockin’ hairstyle or outfit that even I haven’t
seen before.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0601_0701_03_10:
It might be interesting to ask them how they
developed their style!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0602_0701_01_10:
People used to call me a delinquent back in the
day...but now, I’m a proud member of the
Hoenn Elite Four!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0602_0701_02_10:
Meeting all sorts of folks helped me realize what
I really want to do.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0602_0701_03_10:
Make sure you stay connected, kid! Meeting and
knowing people is important.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0603_0701_01_10:
In Hoenn, we have these treats for Pokémon
called Pokéblocks.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0603_0701_02_10:
My partner Pokémon really seems to love ’em.
I got curious and wanted to try one myself, but
someone stopped me before I could take a bite.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0603_0701_03_10:
Heh. Do you wanna try one, too? I wonder
how they taste!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0604_0701_01_10:
Focusing on winning is important when you’re
battling Pokémon, but if you ask me, enjoying the
battle is even more important than that!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0604_0701_02_10:
Some people get really fixated on winning.
But just ’cause you lose doesn’t mean it was all
for nothing.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0604_0701_03_10:
Even if you lose, you’ll still want to try again if
you had fun. And if you try again, that makes you
want to win, right?
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0604_0701_04_10:
That’s why people keep at it. And that’s what
makes us stronger.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0605_0701_01_10:
Y’know, I once had a conversation with Steven
about rocks.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0605_0701_02_10:
He kept going on and on about how some rocks
are a certain color or are so nice to touch because
of their texture, all with this huge grin on his face.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0605_0701_03_10:
I don’t know too much about rocks myself, but I
appreciate his enthusiasm.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/0605_0701_04_10:
I could tell he’s really passionate about
his hobbies.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, hey! Nice to see ya!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/1701_0701_02_10: I have a little present for you. Take it!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/1701_0702_01_10: You can use it and have even more fun exploring!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2501_0701_01_10:
What do you think of my hair and clothes today?
Pretty wild, right? And cool to boot! I’m diggin’ it.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2501_0701_02_10:
But maybe it’s a little too wild for some people...
They’ll stop and stare at me from a distance.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2501_0701_03_10:
I can’t tell if it’s because they’re scared or
interested in trying it out themselves!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2501_0701_04_10:
Either way, if they just walked up and talked to
me about it, I’d be more than happy to chat
with them.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2501_0702_01_10:
Maybe if I notice someone staring, I should go
ahead and initiate the conversation!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2501_0702_02_10:
It might be a good way to make new friends! Like
how I met you!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2511_0701_01_10:
Pokémon battles are all about the challenge.
I think that’s what makes them so much fun.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s also why I like being a member of the Elite
Four—and why it’s so important to me... Because
other Trainers never stop challenging us!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2511_0701_03_10:
You should come and take on the Hoenn Elite Four
someday! That’s bound to lead to some
wild battles!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2511_0702_01_10:
Here on Pasio, I don’t have to stay in one place
like I did as a part of the Elite Four, so I’m using
this opportunity to go around and meet people.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/2511_0702_02_10:
That’s how I got to know you! It’s been worth the
effort I took to get here, so I’m glad I came.
ch0135_00_kagetsu/3001_0701_01_10:
Yo! Are you ready to go? I wanna battle as many
sync pairs as I can today!
ch0135_00_kagetsu/3003_0701_01_10:
No matter how strong you are, you’ve still gotta
have manners. Treat people how you wanna be
treated, you know?
ch0135_00_kagetsu/3005_0701_01_10:
I’ve seen some dangerous people out there at
night. Careful you don’t fall into one of their traps
on your way home, all right?
